shibboleth.data

Interface DataSource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedSource, CachedStore, GithubDataSource, HashMapStore, ReadOnlyCachedSource, SqlDataStore

    public interface DataSource
    This interface represents a source which can provide Github artifacts.
    Author:
    Wilco Wisse
    See Also:
    DataStore

    • Method Detail

      • getRepo

        Repo getRepo(java.lang.String fullRepoName)
        Retrieve a repo from the source.
        Parameters:
        fullRepoName - The full name of the repo, e.g. octocat/HelloWorld.
        Returns:
        The repo if the repo is found in this source, null otherwise.

      • getUser

        User getUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Retrieve a user from the source
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user, e.g. octocat.
        Returns:
        The user if the user is found in this source, null otherwise.

      • getRepos

        Repo[] getRepos(java.lang.String user,
              RepoFilter filter,
              boolean ensureAll)
        Retrieve all repos which user owns. These are not all repos which the user contributed to!
        Parameters:
        user - The user to retrieve repos for.
        filter - A filter to filter which repos should be retrieved.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. This option is useful for caches: If it is fine to return only the appropriate repos which are currently in the cache ensureAll should be false, otherwise ensureAll should be true, and the cache is bypassed.
        Returns:
        The repos of the user, null if we cannot ensure that the entire set of repos which the user owns will be returned.

      • getContributions

        Contribution[] getContributions(java.lang.String repo,
                              boolean ensureAll)
        Retrieve all Contributions for a repo.
        Parameters:
        repo - The repo to retrieve contributions to.
        ensureAll - Determines if all repos of the user should be returned, or if a subset is sufficient. See also the getUser method.
        Returns:
        The contributions for the given repo.

      • getAllContributions

        Contribution[] getAllContributions()
        Returns:
        All contributions this source contains.

      • containsUser

        boolean containsUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Whether the source contains the given user.
        Returns:
        Returns true iff this source contains the user with the given userName.

      • containsRepo

        boolean containsRepo(java.lang.String repoName)
        Whether the source contains the given repo.
        Returns:
        Returns true iff this source contains the repo with the given repoName

      • containsContribution

        boolean containsContribution(java.lang.String repo,
                           java.lang.String user)
        Whether the source contains the given contribution.
        Returns:
        Returns true iff this source contains a contribution for repo by user.

      • containsContributionInfo

        boolean containsContributionInfo(java.lang.String repo,
                               java.lang.String user)
        Whether the source contains the given contribution information.
        Returns:
        Returns true iff this source contains contribution information for repo by user.
        See Also:
        Contribution.getContributionInfo()
